name: Mexican Egg Rolls
author: STEPHANIEJO
summary: These are easy and delicious!  Use them as an appetizer, or as a main dish.  As an appetizer, serve with salsa.  As a main dish, serve on a bed of lettuce with all the taco fixin's you love.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, drained
4 cups oil for frying, or as needed
directions: Crumble ground beef into a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook until evenly browned, and drain off grease
Add  , and cook according to package directions
Heat 1 inch of oil in a large skillet, or preheat a deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lay out one egg roll wrapper at a time, and place a little more than a tablespoon of the ground beef in the center
Top with a small spoonful of green chilies, and a little bit of shredded cheese
Roll up according to package instructions, and seal edges, wetting with water if necessary
Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling
Fry the rolls in the hot oil until golden brown on all sides, about 5 minutes
Remove from the oil to drain on paper towels
